about.text: Hey, I‚Äôm Daan. 16 year-old full-stack developer from the Netherlands. The ‚Äúhacker‚Äù of the family since the age of 10 üòÖ. I wrote my first lines of code when I was 14 and I haven‚Äôt stopped ever since. I love open-source projects, that‚Äôs why I always try to open-source as many of my projects as possible to show progammers and interested users how the code behind a certain button works.

description.small: Finished 3 year bilingual education at the Mendel College.
description.large: I finished my 3 years of bilingual education at the Mendel College, part of the TTO program I follow. It consists of 3 year bilingual education, the FCE and CAE certificate exam at the end of the 4th year.

description.small: Passed the Cambridge B2 First exam.
description.large: I passed the Cambridge B2 First exam with grade B. This is the second part of the TTO program I follow. The last step is to pass the CAE exam in July.

anime.text: I watch anime once in a while when I am bored and don‚Äôt have anything else to do. Every episode I watch is logged on MyAnimeList and displayed here on my own website.
